attributes.action: Home Office to offer one year visa extensions without applications being made.
attributes.additional_details: The Home Office have granted 30months visas to significant amount of people. These visas have been granted with the condition that these people are not entitled to public funds.All those whose visas are due to expire this year need to make application to extend their visas. The Home Office's fee for such application is £2,052 each. The Home Office fee at the best of time is expensive. The fees at this COVID-19 pandemic time will be extortionate and hostile. The UK Government must make concession
attributes.background: The Home Office must extend the visas of all those with 30 months visas which are due to expire this year. This must be granted automatically without those affected making application to the Home Office.
